# MicroBench 

Overview of our data for microbial genomic benchmarking

## Data availability

```{r echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
d<-read_xlsx("data_links.xlsx")
```

### ZymoHMW

```{r echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
d %>% 
  filter(Sample=="ZymoHMW") %>%
  arrange(desc(`date of basecalling`)) %>%
  kable(format = "markdown")
```
